title: 3 Beds 1 Bath Apartment near Belmar
posting_body: This relatively recently renovated apartment is in good condition and includes a washer and dryer, a stove, and air conditioning.
All utilities are included in the rent (gas, electric, water, trash, sewer).
It's 7 minutes by car from Belmar.
The $30 application fee (per person) covers a credit check, background check, and eviction report.
This is the upper-level unit of a multi-unit home in Lakewood.
It's only the upstairs of a house.
The basement is rented to a different tenant.
This is only for the upstairs.
* Does it have a private entrance?
* Do you accept Section 8, SSI (Supplemental Security Income),
We ask for proof of income for both.
A verification letter and for the
self-employed part probably either bank statements or tax documents.
DO NOT attempt to visit without an appointment.
Filling out an application is free.
The fee (paid online after the paper application is turned in) pays for the background check.
It's $30 per applicant 18 years or older.
Rent includes water, sewer, electric, gas, and trash.
